title: Redemptor
description: In the fourth installment of the Valducan series, three years have passed since Valducan knight Matt Hollis defeated Tiamat’s cult, but her demonic children are still on the loose.Now, a mysterious enemy is stealing holy weapons across South America, leaving a trail of bodies in their wake. The Valducans fear that her followers have returned. Not all is as it seems, and a new player has joined this hunt — the paladins of the Catholic Church. To stop an evil that none of them have ever imagined, the Order must set aside centuries of animosity and join forces with their long-standing enemy.In the war against demons, there are weapons on both sides. Monsters aren't born, they're forged.
author: Seth Skorkowsky
